document_data.name: Avarelle Myntdown
document_data.mainbody: '''Avarelle Myntdown''' was a seamstress from [[Hultail]] in [[Cormyr]] active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Avarelle was a well-liked aging matronly woman who once was a stunning beauty.
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century DR, Avarelle ran her mending and seaming business repairing [[cloak]]s, tents, and [[robe]]s. Her skills were practical, and her work was done to last, not to appear pretty. Because of that, she did not take any orders to mend fanciful garments. Avarelle did not charge much for her services and accepted barter or food. Her shop was located on [[Easting Lane]] in the southeastern part of Hultail, across from [[Harrafe Orlimbur]]'s abode.
